author: Zoubin Ghahramani and Michael I. Jordan
title: Factorial Hidden Markov Models
window: HMMs of varying sizes (K ranging from 2 to 6; M ranging from 2 to 9) were also trained on the same data. To approximate the FACTORIAL HIDDEN MARKOV MODELS 17 Table 2. Attributes in the Bach chorale data set. The key signature and time signature attributes were constant over the duration of the chorale. All attributes were treated as real numbers and modeled using the linear-Gaussian observation model
